body:
Hi guys

I thought i would do a AMA since me last one was kinda not noticed (lul)

And cuz i know a lot more ppl now.

Ask away xD

title: AMA mels

replies.body:
Wow didnt knew u were still alive xD.

You are one of my oldest friends and we maked some maps together, i never spoke to you with voice but in chat you were really nice. I like to see you more often on avicus :)

You are a really nice person to talk to and play games with. In the ds server we have a lot of fun

- i hate it
- i like it
- i love it
- i have no clue lol. Its boring but good for my future

4. Dutch is my native language, as u know i can speak english (lol). And I had german and french on my school. I dropped french but im going to master german
